name: Time Bandit (itch)
description:
This is my second Ludum Dare and Game Jam Ever!

a or left arrow to move left!
d or right arrow to move right!

Space to Jump!

This time I made a game called Time Bandit.

The Goal Of The Game is simple Steal all of the time that you can.

If your own time runs out you die and the game ends.

Tell me your Highscores!
